title: It's like a Razer blade, but almost BETTER! - Schenker Vision 14
tags: Are Razer Laptops no longer great?
description: Learn more about CORSAIR's NEW iCUE 5000T RGB Case at   Schenker is an interesting brand. They have taken everything great about Razer laptops; thin, reasonably powerful, and configurable. And, they have given you the ability to upgrade it on your own too. But is it worth paying more for one?  Check out the Schenker Vision 14 at    GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 - Small, thing, and powerful? 0:12 - Unboxing 0:51 - Exterior first impressions and overview 1:51 - Sponsor - Corsair! 2:24 - Display specs 3:07 - Webcam impressions 3:30 - Keyboard and trackpad impressions 4:03 - Speaker impressions 4:23 - Display impressions 4:44 - Performance profiles 5:06 - Laptop specs 6:06 - Gaming performance impressions 7:50 - Screen wobble 7:56 - Weight impressions 8:35 - Taking it apart 8:51 - Battery life 9:06 - Upgradeable and repairability thoughts 10:11 - Overall thoughts 10:25 - Configuration and Price impressions 12:16 - Final thoughts
